div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdme vicesimo septimo
die mensis Noumebris Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day Dauid Soulys litstar grantit that he was borgh' and hammald'
to thomas meldrum for ane cow that was sellit to the said thomas be ane
callit Sandy Keitht

The said day Richerd litstar come Souerte to the bailyeis be his hand vphaldin
for Dauid Sowlis his sone in the law to keip and freitht thomas meldrum
harmeles and skathtles of ane cow sauld' to him be ane sandy Keitht at all
handis quhome It efferis for the quhilk cow the said Dauid come borght and
hammald' to the said thomas

The said day Johnne of gordon in sclaty tuk him to preyve one
mononday this day viij dais that the cow sauld' be sandy Keitht to
thomas meldrum quhilk Dauid soulis come borgh' and hammald' for
to the said thomas was his avin propir cow and takin fra him out of
my lord Abirdenis landis of sclaty

The said day the bailyeis assignit monday that nixt cummys to Johnne'
brabner till ansuer to the borght fundin one him be thomas meldrum

The said day thomas leslie bailye one that ane part and Duncan craik
one that vthir part oblist thame be thar handis vphaldin to vndirly the deliuerance
of Dauid theman Dauid brois' goldsmyth' and adam Weir anent the awaill
of ane goldin ring persewit be the said thomas laid' in wed to the said Duncan
with ane turkas stane' in It to be maid' to the said thomas And' gif the
said ring mycht be gottin the said thomas sall haue It again And deliuere
samekile money as the saide personis makis to him for the awaill of the said
ring to the said' Duncan agane gif he deliueris him the said ring

The said day the prouost and bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to Jonet
blinseill and Willeame Woormet his sone on' that ane part and ser Androu
cuper chaplane of sanct Duthois alter on' that vnthir part athir of
thame to bring thar euidencis sic as thai haue and will wse anent ane
land clamyt be the said ser' androw to pertene to the said alter lik as his fun
dacioun' makis mentioun' quhilk land' the said Jonet possess' and haldis
now And ordanit the said ser Androw to gif to the saidez Jonet and Williame
the claus' contenit in his said fundacioun' of the said land' that thai mycht awis' tharwith'
agane the said day

The said day comperit Dauid treis befor the prouost and baillies sittand'
In Jugement In presens of thomas meldrum and Willeame still and sat downe
one his kne with his cap in his hand and renunsit and reuokit all langag
that he had said one the saidez thomas and Willeame satand he knew nocht
the said personis bot famous leill and trew me' men' and askand thaim forgevnes
of all offens done be him to thame' And the saidez forgef the said Dauid
at the request of the prouost bailyeis and gud men and tuk him in fauovris
and tendirnes agane'

The said day the borgh' fundin one thomas athall in Kinquhortht
be alexander horne that the said thomas aucht to gif him the fill of Johne'
of Ratreis keill of pettis was fundin of awaill becaus the said thomas
referrit and gef the said alexander in his aitht gif he gef him quyt he said petis
quhilkis deponit the gret aitht that he gef him neuir quyt tharfor the said borgh'
was of awaill and the said thomas in amerciament of the court And chargit
be the said balyeis to pay him within terme of law

The said day thome Athall grantit him to pay till Alexander
horne' betuix this and this day xv dais for the fill of the keill of petis
aucht till this said alexander xxtj s' and sex d' And atour he sall cast and
leid' fre to the pethill xx fuddir of pettis gud sufficient stuff
to be deliuerit to the said alexander horne' the nixt sommer to cum

The said day Androu grig grantit him awand' till Willeame'
Watsone x s' of siluer quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of law

The said day the bailyeis ordanit Johne cuk officiar to pas' and warne In
thomas lousone' till Willeamis colpis Instance one friday that nixt cummys

The said day the prouost and bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummys to Jonet
blinseill to preif sufficientlie that Richerd' franchman was awand' hir v s'
of maill quhilkis scho arrestit in Williamis stillis hand'

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne aassis' Jonne of mar forspekar
that gif the videw of Willeame couper will depone the gret aitht that scho sellit
nocht the malt to Williame Wattis sone in the stanehive quhilkis scho was
followit be ane borgh' scho is quyt of the said malt and skath tharof And gif
scho refus' and will nocht suer the said assis' ordand' hir to pay xv s' for
ilk boll of malt samekle' as scho ressavis And the bailyeis supersedit
to awis' hir with the said aitht to the morne'

Curia balliuorum de Abrdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto die mensis Decembris
Anno et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day this borgh' vnder writin that is to say I Thomas meldrum
burges of Aberdene strikis ane borgh' in the handis of Normond' of leslie ane
of the officiaris of the said burgh' vpoun Johnne brabnar burges of the samyne
that quhar I sende my bill with him ande maid him my merchand to sel
for me ane certane of hidis the quhilk contenit x kyppis weile and'
seueralie kipit And' put in Williame bollis schip the quhilk was gud
and sufficient stuf Ande bad him sel thame to the heest price for my
profit as the merkat stud' Neuirtheles' the said Johnne wranguislie
ande aganis the lawe tuk my hidis lous' and kest thame furtht in weit
to saif his avin gudis Ande thareftir keist my gudis weit in the sellar and kest
vthir gudis abone thaim throue the quhilkis my gudis was ewil spilt to my gret skath
and wantis part of the samyne Ande fulfillit nocht my bill I wrat to him in diuers'
poyntis ande wrangis in the doing tharin and' tharto my borgh' and ane borgh
to folowe my borgh' was fundin of nain awaile be ane suorne assis
as It is strikin

Curia Balliuoum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vndecimo die
mnsis Decembris Anno et cetera quingentesimo octauo

Eodem die gilbertus litstar citatus per Andream nauchtie sergeandum ad
instanciam andree lousone non comparuit amerciatur in defectu presencie

Eodem die Johannes brabner citatus per andream naughtie sergeandum
ad comparendum ad instanciam thome meldrum amerciatur in defectu presencie quia non comparuit

The said day the baillies assignit for waknes of the court friday that nixt
cummis till Williame colp to ansuer' till thomas leslie forspekar for Alexander gray for
the wranguis' withaldin fra the said alexander of the principall chartir of his
hous' And for the wranguis' brekin furtht of ane dur in the said alexandris hous'
opinand' to the said Williamis clois' and for the wranguis' withhaldin of v merkis
of maill of the said hous' callit ane kechin be the space of five yeris And for
the wranguis' withhaldin of the maill of ane forsellar pertening to the said alexander
be the space of v yeris extending to v vnicornys Of the quhilkis actionis
forsaid' the said William was accusit of quhilk denyit the samyn tharfor the
bailyeis of thar autorite for waiknes of the court forsaid' And' atour the
said bailyeis assignit the said day to thomas leslie forspekar forsaid in
the nayme and behalf of the said alexander till ansuer to the borghtis
fundin one him be the said Willeame and denyit siclik And' athir of the
said partiis till ansuer till vthiris the said day

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo tercio quinto
die mensis Decembris Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day thir personis vnder writin that is to say grantit to pay the
Somez' that thai aw eftir follouing to Androw Waus betuix this and friday that nixt
cummys that is to say the wif of philp of Kelly clerk viij s' mag still viij s'
the wif of absoloun' xvj s' Donald' baxter vj s'

The said day mag still the wif of William harpar grantit hir awand'
to Johnne arthour xv s' vj d' quhilkis the balyeis chargit hir to pay within
terme of law

The said day the bailyeis assignit monvnday that nixt cummys till alexander
burnat till ansuer to the borgh' strikin of him be alexander horne' and decernit the
copy of the said borgh' to the said alexander burnat one his expens'

The said day Dauid Colp was conuikit be ane suorne assis' ser Johnne'
Ruthirfurd forspekar for the strublance of mathou branche' Abbot of bonacord'
in the execucioun' of his office and till amend' as thai will and forbeir' in tyme tocum
an that was giffin for dome' And the said mathou was maid quyt be the said
assis' of all strublance of the said Dauid

The said day Dauid colp protestit that quhat deliuerance that the assis' maid suorn'
to decid' apoun' the strublance betuix him and mathou branche suld' turne him
to na preiudice souderand' he allegit that he was the kingis seruand'

The said day the bailyeis with consent of partie assignit mononday that nixt cummys
to thomas leslie forspekar for Sandy gray one that ane part and Willeame colp one that
vthir part to comper befor thame withtin the tolbutht athir till ansuer till vthiris
anent all poyntis contenit in the Act' of the buk gangand' befor and warnit baitht
the said partijs s to comper the said day for ministracioun' of Justice in the said
mater

The said day ormond of leslie at command of the bailyeis chargit Dauid colp
to comper befor thame one mononday that nixt cummys till ansuer' to thame It
that thai haue to say to him in the townis nayme'

The said the bailyeis assignit mononday that nixt cummys to Johnne of
gordone in sclaty to preif the price of the cow takin fra him out of sclaty

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo octauo
die mensis Decembris Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day Johnne low smyth grantit him borgh' and dettour to Androw stratoun'
for a man in buchane for iij opin hiddis and iij ky hiddis quhilkis the bailyeis
chargit to pay within terme of law

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xx
secundo die mensis Decembris Anno quo supray

The said day henry rede and alexander Kintor grantit to pay William
boll skippar the mettis of salt as vthir merchandis payit eftir the rite of
the burgh' et cetera

The said day richerd litster come souerte be his handis vphldin to pay
to Duncan colisone xxvij s' scottis money be myd lentern nicht hereftir
folowing for ane cowe that Daui fowlis come borgh' and hammat for
to thomas meldrum the said Dauid oblist him to freitht the said richerd'
of the pament of the said' money quhilk cowe was takin fray Johnne
of gordoun in sclaty as be ane callit sande Keth as in the akis of the
buk mair fullelie Is contenit

The said day William Scrimgeour officiar at commande of the bailyeis
chragit thomas pyle to remane in the tolbutht quhile he pay vj
s' ande aucht d' to ser Dauy Waus optenit one him obefor

Eodem die magister gavinus leslie fecit constituit et ordinauit magistrum
thomam chamer suum legittimum procuratorem dans et concendens eidem suam
veram et integram potestatem mandatum quis speciale pro se et nomine suo
ad petendum exigendum recipiendum omnes et singulos annuos redditus
suos sibi et capellanie sue altaris sancti Johannis baptiste infra
ecclesiam parrochialem dicti burgj pertinenciis de vniuersis et singulis terminis
semper et quovsque prefatus magister gavinus fuerit pacificus possessor
huismodi capellanie Promittens de rato et grato cum ceteris clausis necessariis
et oportunis

add.foreign: Copia regia pro Dauid colp presentata

div.p:
James be the grace of god king of Scottis To the aldirman and ballies
of the burgh' of Abirdene greting fforsamekle' as It is humlie menit and schevin
tile ws be oure louittis William colp and' Dauid colp his sone quhilk
optenit our d lettres direct' be deliuerance of the lordis of our counsale to certan
sereffis in that part Chargeing yowe to haue ministerit Justice to thaim in the
actioun and' caus' movit betuix thaim and' robert guthre with his complicis
anent the spulye fra the said Dauid of Isabell buchane furtht of his
fadiris hous' in abirdene or scho was of lauchfull aig quhilk spulye the
sad Williame and' Dauid' offerit y to haue preuit befor yowe as
ane attentik Instrument takin tharapone proportis as Is allegit And'
nocht withstanding that ye war chargit of befor to haue ministrat Justice tharin
and to haue admittit thar resonable' excepcionis in the matir with certificacioun
and' ye did nocht we and the lordis of oure counsal wald aduocat the said'
matir to ws and' tak the samyne fra yowe and proceid tharin eftir the forme
of our said vthiris lettrez ye haue done nocht tharto as yeit bot deferris to do Justice
tharin and sufferis the said robert to Intromitt with the said Isabellis malys
contrar' equite and' Justice and' sabe Oure will Is herfor and' we charge
yow stratlie and' commandis that Incontinent thir oure lettrez sene ye decist and
cess' fra ale proceding in ony matir depending be summond' befor the said'
lordis of oure counsale betuix the said partiis vnto the tyme the said matir be
decidit be thame as ye wile ansuer to ws vpone execucioun of your
office and vndir ale pane and' charge that eftir may folowe delieruing thir our
lettrez be yowe deulie execut sene and vndirstandin agane to the berar'
gevyne vndir our Signet at Edinburgh' the xij day of august and of oure
Regne the xxj yer' /

The thrid day of Nouember The yer' within writin ws thomas leslie
thomas Waus thomas Wode and' Duncan colisone bailyeis of the burgh'
of Abirdene ressaue thir oure Souerane lordis lettrez within writin fra Dauid colp quhilkis
rede hard and vndirstandin be ws we desistit amd seissit fra ale proceding in ony
mater within writin depending befor the lordis of our Souerane lordis counsaile betuix
the partiis within writin vnto the tyme the said matir be decidit And' atour we chargit
the four officiaris of the said burgh' to desist fra ale Intrometting with the'
samyne eftir the tenor of thir our Souerane lordis lettrez within writin In witnes of the
quhilkis to this our execucioun we the saidez' thomas Waus and thomas leslie has
affixt our Selys for ws and remanent of the said baillies day and place forsaid'
